title: J.P. Morgan's Laskowitz: Healthy IPOs Good for Private
description: Jed Laskowitz, JPMorgan Asset Management’s Head of Global Private Markets and Customized Solutions, says it’s an interesting time to invest in public companies because strong public markets ultimately benefit private markets. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
